name: Night HARVEST
description:
A UFO began to fly into the garden of the old farmer and steal the crop. Help the farmer fight off the harvest from the uninvited guest.

A farmer can only carry one weapon at a time. Put one weapon on the box and take another.

Shoot at the UFO's weak spots with matching color weapons.

Control :

swda - move

Shift - run

space - jump

Lmb - Fire
